channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow ekes out gain, Nasdaq and S&P 500 end lower as Fed frets over inflation
Fed officials see inflation on the horizon, think consumers will bear the burden
Judge calls Trump DOJ's request to release Epstein grand jury records a 'diversion'
item.description: The request for grand jury records came as President Donald Trump came under pressure from supporters and critics alike over his handling of the Epste...

item.title: Why does the Trump administration keep accusing officials of mortgage fraud?
Trump has snapped up more than $100 million in bonds since taking office
item.description: The U.S. president has purchased hundreds of bonds issued by companies, local governments and school boards.

item.title: Nasdaq leading stocks lower as Fed minutes show officials' inflation concerns
Trump tariff revenue expected to offset tax bill impact, S&P says in U.S. credit rating hold
item.description: S&P Global warned U.S. government debt credit ratings could "come under pressure" if political developments affect the independence of the Federal Res...

item.title: Here’s how SoftBank could turn Intel’s fortunes around
Fed's Cook says she will not be 'bullied' into resigning after Trump official accuses her of mortgage fraud
item.description: Trump has targeted the Federal Reserve and its chairman, Jerome Powell, as he pressures the central bank to slash interest rates.

item.title: Trump expands 50% steel and aluminum tariffs to include 407 additional product types
item.description: President Donald Trump has often relied on sector-specific tariffs to enact his sprawling trade agenda.
